catentdesc.name: Operating System
catentdesc.shortdescription: Install the latest and greatest 64 bit operating system on your computer.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get the maximum performance out of your personal computer using this 64 bit operating system. It can access a large amount of memory, while leveraging your personal computer's CPU to its fullest. Additional software includes a complete suite of productivity tools built into the operating system.

catentdesc.name: CPU
catentdesc.shortdescription: Improve the performance of your computer with a faster CPU.
catentdesc.longdescription: Get the maximum performance out of your personal computer using this 64 bit processor. This processor supports the latest and greatest architectures, and far exceeds your everyday computing needs.

catentdesc.name: Blank DVD
catentdesc.shortdescription: Backup all your important documents onto a single compact disk.
catentdesc.longdescription: Whether you are storing photos, videos, or music, blank DVDs are the perfect balance between cost, storage space, and convenience. These blank DVDs can store up to 8.5 GB of data.

catentdesc.name: Hard Drive
catentdesc.shortdescription: Expand your storage limits with a larger hard drive.
catentdesc.longdescription: The more hard drive space, the better! Store all your documents, pictures, videos, music, and more, all without worrying about running out of space.

catentdesc.name: Video Card
catentdesc.shortdescription: Improve the performance of your videos and games with a powerful video card.
catentdesc.longdescription: Play all your games at the highest quality settings, and optimum resolutions with a top-of-the-line video card. You can even hook up multiple monitors and play games in style!

catentdesc.name: Memory
catentdesc.shortdescription: Improve multitasking capabilities with faster and larger memory.
catentdesc.longdescription: You can never have enough memory in your system. Adding more memory is one of the easiest upgrades you can do on your computer, and provides immediate benefits. Enjoy improved multitasking with faster and more memory!
